descriptionHtml:
*this post contains my own personal tastes. So if you don\'t like it, please, feel free to leave.*


*****************************************************************************************************************************************
Introduction:
I first made this character just to play Skyrim, but as I start working on her appearances I think It might be awesome to share it with members of the Nexus Community. So here it is ;\")

Installation:
You have to install this manually; 
1/ Unzip it
2/ Copy the save into this file (C:\\Users\\(Your Username)\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves)
3/ Open Skyrim load the game
4/ Use the console and type in \"tfc\" then try to move
5/ Enjoy ;)
6/ (Optional): If you have trouble with the overweight, you should open the console and type in (player.setav carryweight 9999999) or... you can just dump all the items in the inventory :P

***** IMPORTANT ******
There is a \"few\" (yes, when i said few, that means alot) mods you need to install first before using this save (i love mods, yay, Skyrim Nexus)

REQUIRED:
Caliente\'s CBBE by Calientes
or 
Diamonized UNP female body by dimon99
BrightEyes by Skree000
Catwalk by Edion
Coverwomen by mrLenski
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
FavoredSouls Angels in Skyrim by FavoredSoul

Optional:
Better standing animation by WiseClock
Seraphim Armor (dark or white) depends on your opinion
Divine Aegis by Sader and Shodan44
FavoredSouls Evening Star by FavoredSoul
FavoredSouls Sword of the Seeker by FavoredSoul
Layer Bikini by anano
Alduin\'s Scale Armor by Justice
realistic Lighting by Pluto
Relistic smoke isoku
realistic water by isoku
skyrim enchanced shaders by tapioks
Skyrim sungglare by Laast
Tesv Acceleration Layer by Arisu and others
Dancing Crane Katana by Krusty
darksiders shields and gauntlets by drk937
Improved Eisen Armor - Purchasable - Craftable - Improvable by Codecrackerx9 - Invalidfate - NPR
Inferno Sword and Greatsword by agovideo
Karliah Armor by hentai
Mystic Elven Armor by Sader
Sexy Whiterun by horrorview
Nightingale retext - Black Sacrament - Craftable ninja armor by AmethystDeceiver


(I strongly recommend the main/new version because those 2 are the untouched characters, I haven\'t done any quests yet. the Old version is my actual game, the one that im playing)
author: lnguyen2080
